Package entity

Class FlatType

  • java.lang.Object
    • entity.FlatType
  • public class FlatType
extends java.lang.Object
    The FlatType class represents a specific type of flat available in a housing project. It encapsulates details about the flat type including its category (2-room, 3-room, etc.), total number of units, available units, and selling price. This class provides functionality to manage flat inventory and track availability.

        Full constructor that initializes a FlatType with all specified values.
        Parameters:
        numUnits - Total number of units of this flat type
        availableUnits - Number of units currently available for booking
        sellingPrice - The selling price in SGD
        type - The category of flat (TWO_ROOM, THREE_ROOM, etc.)

      • decreaseAvailableUnits

        public boolean decreaseAvailableUnits()
        Decreases the available units count by one when a flat is booked. Only decreases if there are units available.
        Returns:
        true if the count was decreased, false if no units are available

      • increaseAvailableUnits

        public boolean increaseAvailableUnits()
        Increases the available units count by one when a booking is cancelled. Only increases if the available count is less than the total count.
        Returns:
        true if the count was increased, false if already at maximum

      • toString

        public java.lang.String toString()
        Creates a string representation of this flat type.
        Overrides:
        toString in class java.lang.Object
        Returns:
        A string containing flat type details
